title: Exploring the songs
description: This notebook contains mostly exploration of the songs themselves, using the train data only to get the total play count and target variables. I'll do some data exploration of the users later, in a separate notebook. (I apologize in advance for some inefficient code, repeated groupby's, etc., - I didn't really plan out the exploration beforehand, so there are some repeated pieces.)
